item.title: Cracker Barrel’s Response to Intense Criticism Over Its New Logo Is a Brilliant Lesson for Every Brand
item.description: The company is keeping its ‘Old Timer’ logo.

item.title: GPT-5 Falls Short of True AGI. That’s Not a Bad Thing
item.description: True AGI could be years—or decades—away. Or it could never happen. But the real question we should be asking about AGI isn’t ‘when.’

item.title: Why You Need to Lock Down Your Financials
item.description: Most cash management should happen outside of the finance department.

item.title: How to Boost Your Emotional Intelligence in Just 3 Minutes
item.description: A new study finds a simple three-minute intervention can have a surprisingly big effect on everyday emotional intelligence.

item.title: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce Just Got Engaged. Brands Are Rushing to Join the Conversation
item.description: The singer and NFL player’s announcement sparked countless social media posts, marketing emails, and even some discount codes.
